In the entry function we can find a lot of method calls. There are about a dozen functions that print messages and one fgets function that handles input. At the end of the print statements and before the loop we can find a line where a variable is initialized with the value â€œTerry Davis was awesome !â€. Giving that as the input will open a new window with a â€œCongratulations!â€ message.

Have a great day :) R.I.P. King Terry Davis
